resources.string: Gesture Navigation
Use your phone with modern gestures

If you disallow the application to use accessibility, it will not work at all!
	Why is this needed?
	• The application can't do gesture detection without this
	• The application can't provide you with its core functionality without this

How to use?
Single Swipe
	• Swipe up quickly to get to your home
	• Swipe up quickly then hold for a bit to see recent applications
	• Swipe from the left or right quickly to the center to go back
	• Swipe from the left or right slowly to the center to take a screenshot
	• Swipe up and down without letting go to see your notifications
Double Swipe
(Swipe up first then hold until you see the bar change colors)
	• Swipe up again to open the camera
Please switch navigation modes
Search for navigation in the settings, and set it to the 3 button navigation.
Proceed
Cancel
Fix the following issues to continue!
Bar not displayed?
Fix
Fixed possible issues
Seems like the service is not running
To relaunch it, you need to disable and re-enable the service in the settings.
Disable and Re-Enable \"Gesture Navigation\" in Accessibility!
Proceed
Cancel
Grant accessibility permissions to the app!
Please find the app in the settings menu, and allow it to use accessibility.
Grant Permissions
You are not using the 3 button navigation!
Please witch your navigation mode to the 3 buttons (old style), as having multiple gesture navigation will freak out your phone.
Change Navigation
